trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Rockford
There were no other sightings in Rockford on or around December 24th 2012
Summary: 3 red lights in a triangle pattern, pulsed then turned to a bright yellow and disappeared
divs: sighting detailsi was at my fiance's mothers house on christmas eve around 9pm, went outside to get xbox 360 controller from my truck. i saw a blink of red out of the corner of my eye, i stopped to look. i first thought the light was a satellite but after i saw it flash in a triangular pattern i realized it was not. i tried to see if a could take a photo with my phone but no lights were visible from the phone. i called my fiance to come outside to check it out but she did not answer. i was excited and i didn't want to take my eyes off it in fear i would miss something. i watched it flash not sure the order of the lights, thought it could have been one object moving in a triangular motion but now i believe it was one object flashing, i only saw the light one at a time, flashing when it reached to top of the triangle it turned from red to a bright yellow then disappeared behind a cloud. i watched for a moment longer then i went inside and told the family what i had saw and then went back out to see if i could see anything else. nothing else was seen . clouds . . clouds ttytrees___treesty \ | \ \ | \
